meanings.definition: Neuroglias: cells in the nervous system that support and protect neurons.
meanings.sent1: The neuroglias in the brain provide essential protection for the neurons.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study neuroglias to understand how they help neurons function properly.
meanings.sent3: The neuroglias threw a tiny party to celebrate keeping the neurons safe.
meanings.sent4: Like guardians, neuroglias shield the neurons from harm in the nervous system.
meanings.sent5: Imagine neuroglias as the bodyguards of the neurons, always vigilant and protective.
